item.title: Who is this 'Chris Gibbons' guy then?
item.description: A potted history Chris Gibbons is an experienced digital developer specialising in front-end development, with a mild obsession for well written & clean code. He also hates speaking about himself in the third person. After working with the amazing guys at Code Computerlove for nearly 8 years, working my way up to Snr. Front End developer, I then spent the next 12 months working as a UI engineer at Zuto where I enjoyed the challenge of trying to build a bridge between front-end and UX in the world of car finance.
